content:
OracleLobOpenMode Enum

Definition

Specifies whether an OracleLob should be opened in read-only or read/write mode.

In this Article

public enum OracleLobOpenMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
OracleLobOpenMode

Fields

ReadOnly

The OracleLob is opened in read-only mode.
ReadWrite

The OracleLob is opened in read/write mode.
